trans-unit.source: Defines a command that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and is routed through the element tree.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un comando che implementa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> ed è indirizzato tramite la struttura ad albero dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> do not contain the application logic for the command as is the case with a typical <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, but rather, these methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> metodi su un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> non contengono la logica dell'applicazione per il comando, come nel caso di una tipica <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, ma piuttosto, questi metodi generano eventi che passano attraverso la struttura ad albero dell'elemento alla ricerca di un oggetto con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The event handlers attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contain the command logic.
trans-unit.target: I gestori eventi associati per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contengono la logica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> metodo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> metodo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> eventi.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *predefinedClassName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedClassName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined command classes.
trans-unit.target: Una delle classi di comandi predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: *predefinedCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedCommandName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined commands.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei comandi predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: *customClassName*
trans-unit.target: *customClassName*

trans-unit.source: A custom class which contains the custom command.
trans-unit.target: Una classe personalizzata che contiene il comando personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: Custom classes generally require an `xlmns` prefix mapping; see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Le classi personalizzate richiedono in genere un `xlmns` anteporre al mapping, vedere [spazi dei nomi XAML e Mapping Namespace per XAML WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: *customCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *customCommandName*

trans-unit.source: A custom command.
trans-unit.target: Un comando personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Nome dichiarato per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The type which is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: Tipo che sta registrando il comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name and owner type.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> con il nome e il tipo di proprietario specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Nome dichiarato per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The type that is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo che registra il comando.

trans-unit.source: Default input gestures associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: Movimenti di input predefiniti associati a questo comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name, owner type, and collection of gestures.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> con il nome specificato, il tipo di proprietario e l'insieme di movimenti.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: the length of <paramref name="name" /> is zero
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di <paramref name="name" /> è zero.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data type.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di dati definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The command target.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione del comando.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> can execute in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> può essere eseguito nello stato corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il comando può essere eseguito in corrispondenza della destinazione corrente del comando. In caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that determines if a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute on the current command target is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods, rather <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: La logica effettiva che determina se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> può essere eseguita in corrente destinazione del comando non è inclusa nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> metodi, piuttosto <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> eventi tunnel e il bubbling elemento ricerca di un oggetto con struttura un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> per tale <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> viene trovato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> collegato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute or not.
trans-unit.target: Questi gestori forniscono la logica di programmazione per determinare se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> può eseguire o meno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> in cui vengono generati eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> non è impostata sul <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> vengono generati eventi sull'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> gestore dell'evento da un'implementazione personalizzata di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` In questo esempio è la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è `null`, il comando viene eseguito il cast a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, viene eseguito il cast un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disable.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> restituisce `true`, quindi il controllo è abilitato; in caso contrario, il controllo è disabilitato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> né <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando vengono rilevate modifiche all'origine comando da parte del gestore del comando.

trans-unit.source: These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Queste modifiche spesso influiscono sull'esecuzione del comando in corrispondenza della destinazione corrente del comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, which is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> attende la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento, viene generato dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento viene generato ogni volta che vengono soddisfatte le condizioni che potrebbero modificare se eseguire il comando, ad esempio una modifica nello stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: When the command receives the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il comando riceve il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento, viene generato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si attenderà l'origine del comando per questo evento e query di <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> per mezzo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte delle origini di comando verranno disabilitate se il comando non può essere eseguito come parte dell'associazione del comando.

trans-unit.source: An example of this is when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> grays itself out when the command cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio è quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> diventa inattivo quando non è possibile eseguire il comando.

trans-unit.source: In some situations, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> è a conoscenza di una modifica nelle condizioni che modifica la possibilità di eseguire un comando.

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you can force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method, this will in turn cause the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, è possibile forzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> su Genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> (metodo), ciò determinerà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> per generare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> gestore dell'evento da un'implementazione personalizzata di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` In questo esempio è la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è `null`, il comando viene eseguito il cast a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, viene eseguito il cast un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> restituisce `true`, quindi il controllo è abilitato; in caso contrario, il controllo è disabilitato.

trans-unit.source: User defined parameter to be passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: Parametro definito dall'utente da passare al gestore.

trans-unit.source: Element at which to begin looking for command handlers.
trans-unit.target: Elemento in cui effettuare la ricerca dei gestori di comando.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Esegue <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> in corrispondenza della destinazione corrente del comando.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La logica effettiva che esegue il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> non è inclusa nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events, which tunnel and bubble through the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> Genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> eventi, tunnel e a bolle tramite l'elemento di struttura ad albero ricerca di un oggetto con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> per tale <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> viene trovato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> collegato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Questi gestori forniscono la logica di programmazione che esegue il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> in cui vengono generati eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> non è impostata sul <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> vengono generati eventi sull'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: The following example is from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> sample.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente proviene da un'implementazione personalizzata di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> esempio.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the Command property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` In questo esempio è la proprietà comando sul <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not null, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è null, il comando viene eseguito il cast a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, viene eseguito il cast un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A> viene chiamato metodo passando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> né <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> objects that are associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> associato a questo comando.

trans-unit.source: The input gestures.
trans-unit.target: I movimenti di input.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come aggiungere un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del comando.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Nome del comando.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used when referencing a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata quando si fa riferimento un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is registered with the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo registrato con il comando.

trans-unit.source: The type of the command owner.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di proprietario del comando.

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: Dati usati dal comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non richiede dati da passare, questo oggetto può essere impostato su <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this command can be executed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il comando può essere eseguito. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: Dati usati dal comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non richiede dati da passare, questo oggetto può essere impostato su <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
